resources.string:
Tap *Switch Mode * at the upper right to switch modes between manipulating or loading images and manipulating calipers. 

Use your finger to move and position calipers or move and zoom the image depending on the mode.

Add calipers with the *Add Caliper* menu item, single tap a caliper to highlight it, remove highlighting by tapping a spot without a caliper, and double tap to delete a caliper. After calibration the menu items that allow toggling interval and rate and calculating mean rates and QTc will be enabled. 

See the Help menu for full help information.
